original_text: Shalt thou reign, because thou closest thyself in cedar? did not thy father eat and drink, and do judgment and justice, and then it was well with him?
korean_text: 네가 백향목을 많이 사용하여 왕이 될 수 있겠느냐 네 아버지가 먹거나 마시지 아니하였으며 정의와 공의를 행하지 아니하였느냐 그 때에 그가 형통하였었느니라

sentences.original_text: because thou closest thyself in cedar?
did not thy father eat and drink
and then it was well with him?
